snippet: On Tuesday, “Cold War,” a 24-part CNN documentary series first shown on television in 1998, will be released on DVD.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley TV Watch column discusses the 24-part CNN documentary series Cold War, which first aired in 1998 and has now been released on DVD. Photos (M)ù
lead_paragraph: Which part of the cold war is over? In Beijing a Chinese dissident seeks protection in the American Embassy. A Russian general threatens pre-emptive attacks on Western missile-defense sites in Poland. A sleeper cell of Russians posing as ordinary Americans is unmasked one day; on another, British spy equipment is discovered hidden in a fake rock on a Moscow street.

headline.main: Still a Chill in Spy vs. Spy
